Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "How do you know it's me?", 3: '7'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I've long remembered the sound of your footsteps! Of course I know it's you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Always with your jokes. How are you doing?', 3: '9'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Much better, thanks to all of you. Check this out—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Good as new!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You do look like your usual lively self.', 3: '15'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hehe, didn't I tell you the almighty Kamui will be back in no time? See, I wasn't lying!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Are you sure you're fine?", 3: '18'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Absolutely! You can check the data on the Maintenance Chamber if you want.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'll never lie to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "—You're Commandant, after all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'By the way, are you here by yourself, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "That's great!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Nothing. It's just that...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "There's something important I want to tell you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'About your... body?', 3: '27', 4: "It's not... what I think it is, is it?", 5: '41'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'You knew, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: "I've known you for a while, after all.", 3: '29'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'So, what would you do if it was you, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: '...If there was another you in the world.', 4: '1'}
{2: "It... must be confusing, isn't it?", 3: '33'}
{2: 'Because each life is unique.', 3: '34'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Even for Construct?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Even for Construct.', 3: '36', 4: "To me, you're all unique individuals. You're all alive.", 5: '36'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Is that why it'd confuse you, Commandant? Because you wouldn't be unique anymore?", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's right.", 3: '38'}
{2: "But I'm sure I would want to talk to the other me eventually.", 3: '39'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Is that so... Thank you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Huh? Do you know what I want to say already?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Ah! You lied!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'And here I thought you already got me all figured out.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Someday, perhaps.', 3: '46'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh? Does that mean you want to know more about me, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It'd help us work together better, for sure.", 3: '48'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hahaha! I was just kidding. You really don't stop thinking about tactics and plans.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'So, what was it that you were trying to say?', 3: '50'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'You know... Just something impractical. The future.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "See, we're fighting because we want to reclaim Earth, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Then, say, if that day does arrive...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'How will our lives change?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Um... You've got me stumped.", 3: '57'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Have you not thought about it, Commandant? Once the war is over, we won't have these packed schedules and daily routines anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "We'll have so much free time to do what we want to do, to go where we want to go.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'What will you want to do, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I really care about this. I want to know.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you feeling lost?', 3: '63'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "...I am. I knew I couldn't fool you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'We were made only to take back the home of humans.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'And when we do, we will no longer have any purpose...', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Scratch your head)', 3: '68'}
{2: "I didn't think you would ask something so... sentimental.", 3: '71'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "That doesn't sound like me, does it? Maybe I've spent too much time with you, Commandant, and I care about more things now.", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's good. That means your M.I.N.D. is getting more stable.", 3: '73'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hehe, I feel like I've just been babbling nonstop. I hope you don't mind, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "See? I knew it. You're the best!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'About your question.', 3: '77'}
{2: "I don't know the answer now, that's true.", 3: '79'}
{2: "But I'll be searching for it. With you.", 3: '80'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Then that's a promise!", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's a promise.", 3: '82'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: '(Chuckles)', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I might be part of the Strike Hawks...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "But I won't stop fighting for that future of yours.", 4: '1'}
